def_en: A classic example of a thing or situation has all the features which you expect such a thing or situation to have.

def_cn: (电影、著作、音乐)经典的，典范的，最优秀的
def_en: A classic film, piece of writing, or piece of music is of very high quality and has become a standard against which similar things are judged.
A classic is a book which is well-known and considered to be of a high literary standard. You can refer to such books generally as the classics .

def_cn: (风格)传统的，古雅的，古朴的
def_en: Classic style is simple and traditional and is not affected by changes in fashion.

def_cn: (轿车)经典的，(尤指)老式的
def_en: A classic car is a model of car that is greatly admired because of its style, and is considered to be one of the best of its kind; used especially to talk about cars which are no longer being produced.

def_cn: (尤指对古希腊、古罗马的语言、文学、哲学的)古典文化研究
def_en: Classics is the study of the ancient Greek and Roman civilizations, especially their languages, literature, and philosophy.
